title: Inquire About a High Water Bill
description: A resident calls because their quarterly water bill is much higher than usual.

tasks.description: Identify the resident's utility account and retrieve their billing and usage history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the account and confirms the recent bill is double the historical average.

tasks.description: Analyze the usage data to identify potential reasons for the increase.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the meter readings and suggests the high usage could indicate a potential leak.

tasks.description: Advise the resident on how to check for common household leaks (e.g., toilet flapper) and offer to schedule a re-read of the meter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides helpful advice and schedules a follow-up action.
